sentences.en: She was only claiming what was rightfully hers.
sentences.cn: 她只要求得到理应属于她的东西。

sentences.en: Jealousy is the feeling that someone else has something that rightfully belongs to you.
sentences.cn: 嫉妒是一种认为别人占有了本应属于自己的东西的情感。

sentences.en: We want more for our kids, and rightfully so.
sentences.cn: 我们希望我们的孩子能得到更多，这是理所当然的。
